package.whyDescription: DHI technique stands out with the latest technology and high success rate in hair transplantation. Reasons why we at Elithair prefer only DHI Hair Transplant:

benefit1.title: Direct Implantation:
benefit1.description: Hair follicles are implanted immediately after being taken from the donor area. This increases the survival rate of the follicles.

benefit2.title: High Success Rate:
benefit2.description: DHI method offers a high success rate with immediate implantation of follicles. This provides permanent and satisfying results.
